name: Puzzle for Toddlers Sea Fishes
description:
Your toddler loves every kind of peg puzzle and wooden puzzle ?
Your child want to explore sea life, discover fish species and all the sea creatures ?
you have found the right educational game !

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination.

Puzzle for Toddlers - Sea Fishes and Aquatic Animals is simple and fun :
* Touch the screen to drag and drop the fishes in the right spot.
* Pop all the bubbles when a puzzle is solved.
* Tap on the rock to pass to the next level.

18 beautiful puzzles in the unlocked version with colorful fishes and sea creatures: whale, dolphin, octopus, squid, cuttlefish, jellyfish, crab, lobster,
swordfish, shark, sawfish, hammerhead shark, seahorse, starfish, seals, penguins, sea lions, tuna, sea turtle, killer whale, clownfish and many others!

Funny cartoon sound effects !
A stunning collection of fishes with these free puzzles games !
When a puzzle is completed toddlers are rewarded with celebrations and interactions.

Your toddler will dive into this wooden peg puzzle with a fish-eye view of beautiful undersea fishes.

If your toddler loves to explore sea and the ocean this is the best puzzle game for your child.

Puzzles for Toddlers is a must have app for little divers. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 0-7 years old
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-a lot of fun with bubbles popping after a puzzle is completed
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-high quality undersea illustrations and sea animals
-lots of different seabeds and underwater creatures
-the best puzzle for toddlers and little kids !

Help your kids to learn and inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination!

In this free game for toddlers you can unlock all puzzles and remove the advertising in app.

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
developers: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
